data.comment: The big names in today's match at Jose Alvalade have now been confirmed.
The first-half is in progress. Sporting get the game underway.
In the minute 1, Throw-in Sporting.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Antonio Nobre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Tondela.
Sporting surge into the attack at Jose Alvalade but Sebastian Coates’s header is off-target.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Tondela at Jose Alvalade.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Tondela.
Tiago Tomas for Sporting drives towards goal at Jose Alvalade. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 6, Sporting to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
Tondela have a goal kick.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 9, In Lisbon Tondela's Joao Pedro is caught offside.
Antonio Nobre signals a Sporting throw-in in Tondela's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Antonio Nobre signals a Sporting throw-in in Tondela's half.
In the minute 11, Antonio Nobre awards the away team a throw-in.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Sporting drive upfield and Zouhair Feddal gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tondela defender.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Sporting.
Sporting drives forward and Tiago Tomas gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Attention is being given to Tondela’s Rafael Barbosa and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 17, Tondela's Rafael Barbosa is back in action after a slight knock.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Sporting.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Sporting have a dangerous throw-in.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 22, Pedro Goncalves gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sporting.
Joao Mario (Sporting) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sporting's Nuno Mendes gets in a shot on goal at Jose Alvalade. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Tondela.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 26, Antonio Nobre awards Sporting a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
Tondela's Salvador Agra has run offside.
In the minute 28, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Sporting.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Tondela's Filipe Ferreira has been booked in Lisbon.
In the minute 29, Sporting to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
In the minute 32, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Jose Alvalade, Joao Palhinha has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Tondela.
Antonio Nobre signals a throw-in for Tondela, close to Sporting's area.
Throw-in Tondela.
In the minute 34, Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Antonio Nobre signals a Sporting throw-in in Tondela's half.
In the minute 36, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In Lisbon Sporting drive forward through Pedro Goncalves. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 37, Zouhair Feddal (Sporting) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Tondela have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Tondela in the half of Sporting.
Free kick Sporting.
Nuno Mendes for Sporting gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Free kick Sporting.
Andraz Sporar (Sporting) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 42, Sporting's Joao Mario is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Tondela at Jose Alvalade.
Can Tondela capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Jose Alvalade.
Sporting's Pedro Goncalves scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 45, Pedro Porro with an assist there.
In the minute 46, Antonio Nobre blows to start the second-half. Tondela with the kick-off.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
In the minute 46, Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
The away team replace Joao Jaquite with Mario Gonzalez.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Nobre signals a Sporting throw-in in Tondela's half.
In the minute 49, Goal! Sporting extend their lead to 2-0 through Pedro Goncalves.
Andraz Sporar instrumental with a fine assist.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Pedro Trigueira.
In the minute 50, Tondela’s Pedro Trigueira is on his feet again at Jose Alvalade.
Antonio Nobre awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tondela in the half of Sporting.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Sporting.
Tiago Tomas for Sporting is whistled offside.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Sporting.
Tondela drive forward but Mario Gonzalez is judged offside.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 58, Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tiago Tomas of Sporting smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
In the minute 59, In Lisbon Sporting drive forward through Andraz Sporar. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sporting pushes forward through Andraz Sporar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sporting are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 61, Sporting's Joao Mario misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Tondela at Jose Alvalade.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Tondela.
Sporting's Joao Mario breaks free at Jose Alvalade. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Antonio Nobre awards Tondela a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Tondela push forward at Jose Alvalade and Mario Gonzalez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sporting defence.
Throw-in Sporting.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Matheus Nunes is on a sub for Joao Palhinha for Sporting.
Sporting make their second substitution with Nuno Santos replacing Tiago Tomas.
Pako Ayestaran (Tondela) is making a second substitution, with Abdel Jalil replacing Mohamed Naoufel Khacef.
In the minute 67, The away team have replaced Jhon Murillo with Bebeto. This is the third substitution made today by Pako Ayestaran.
Sporting's Pedro Goncalves is whistled for offside at Jose Alvalade.
In Lisbon, Rafael Barbosa of Tondela is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 71, Joao Pedro of Tondela gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 72, Antonio Nobre awards Tondela a goal kick.
In Lisbon Sporting attack through Andraz Sporar. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 76, Play has been interrupted briefly in Lisbon to check on Joao Pedro, who is grimacing with pain.
Pedro Augusto is replacing Rafael Barbosa for Tondela at Jose Alvalade.
Souleymane Anne (Tondela) has replaced the possibly injured Joao Pedro.
In the minute 78, Pedro Goncalves (Sporting) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sporting are pushing forward but Joao Mario's finish is wide of the goal.
Tondela have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Pedro Porro puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Great play from Nuno Santos to set up the goal.
In the minute 80, Ruben Amorim is making the team's third substitution at Jose Alvalade with Jovane Cabral replacing Pedro Goncalves.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 83, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Zouhair Feddal (Sporting) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Tondela defenders.
In the minute 85, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Sporting.
Free kick Sporting.
Ruben Amorim is making the team's fourth substitution at Jose Alvalade with Gonzalo Plata replacing Nuno Mendes.
In the minute 86, Pedro Augusto (Tondela) has received a first yellow card.
Matheus Nunes (Sporting) has received a yellow card from Antonio Nobre.
Nuno Santos for Sporting has been booked by Antonio Nobre and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
At Jose Alvalade the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tondela in the half of Sporting.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
That's full-time at Jose Alvalade. The final score is 4-0.
Goal! Andraz Sporar extends Sporting's lead to 4-0.
